extends Object

        edit in interface MediawikiApi
        Parameters:
        pagetitle - the title of the page
        text - the text of the page
        summary - the edit summary. Summaries longer than 200 characters are truncated server-side.

        the edit stage as a wrapped Edit API response
        Throws:
        Exception - - if the edit fails

      • maininstance

        protected int maininstance(String[] args)
        main instance - this is the non-static version of main - it will run as a static main would but return it's exitCode to the static main the static main will then decide whether to do a System.exit(exitCode) or not.
        Parameters:
        args - - command line arguments
        Returns:
        - the exit Code to be used by the static main program
